* Datenbank-Schema:

    status TEXT NOT NULL

1. Erstellen der Datenbank und des Datenbank-Schemas

3. Implementieren der Logik für die Erfassung von Code-Bugs und neuen Ideen

{"schema": "Okay, hier ist das Datenbank-Schema für eine umfassende ToDo-Listen-App, die Code-Bugs und neue Ideen erfasst, mit Fokus auf SQLite als Backend und Normalisierung bis 3NF.  Da die GUI-Anforderungen (Glassmorphismus, Hover-Effekte etc.) außerhalb des Bereichs der Datenbankgestaltung liegen, konzentriere ich mich hier voll auf das Datenmodell. Ich werde auch Index-Empfehlungen geben, um die Performance der Abfragen zu optimieren.

**1. DDL-Statements (SQLite)**

```sql
CREATE TABLE task_categories (
    category_id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT,
    category_name TEXT NOT NULL UNIQUE CHECK (LENGTH(category_name) > 0)
);

CREATE TABLE tasks (
    task_id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT,
    category_id INTEGER NOT NULL,
    task_name TEXT NOT NULL CHECK (LENGTH(task_name) > 0),
    description TEXT,
    status TEXT NOT NULL DEFAULT 'Open' CHECK (status IN ('Open', 'In Progress', 'Resolved', 'Closed')),
    priority INTEGER CHECK (priority BETWEEN 1 AND 5), -- 1=High, 5=Low
    due_date DATE,
    created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
    updated_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
    FOREIGN KEY (category_id) REFERENCES task_categories(category_id) ON DELETE CASCADE ON UPDATE CASCADE
);

CREATE TABLE bug_reports (
    bug_id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT,
    task_id INTEGER,
    report_date TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
    description TEXT NOT NULL,
    steps_to_reproduce TEXT,
    severity TEXT CHECK (severity IN ('Critical', 'Major', 'Minor', 'Trivial')),
    status TEXT NOT NULL DEFAULT 'Open' CHECK (status IN ('Open', 'In Progress', 'Resolved', 'Closed')),
    FOREIGN KEY (task_id) REFERENCES tasks(task_id) ON DELETE SET NULL ON UPDATE CASCADE
);

CREATE TABLE idea_submissions (
    idea_id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT,
    task_id INTEGER,
    submission_date TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
    description TEXT NOT NULL,
    priority INTEGER CHECK (priority BETWEEN 1 AND 5), -- 1=High, 5=Low

Ich liefere vollständige CSS-Variablen, Farbdefinitionen, Layout-Anweisungen und Gedanken zur Interaktion.  Dieses Konzept ist detailreich und direkt für die Entwicklung geeignet.

**App-Name:** "Insight" (oder Vorschlag für einen passenden Namen, der Klarheit und Fortschritt signalisiert).

**Zielgruppe:** Softwareentwickler und Tester.

**Kernfunktionen:**

*   **Bug-Tracking:** Erfassung, Beschreibung, Statusverfolgung von Code-Bugs.
*   **Ideenfindung:** Erfassung und Priorisierung von Verbesserungsvorschlägen (Tests, Features etc.).
*   **Lokale Speicherung:**  Datenbankbasiert (SQLite) für Offline-Zugriff und Datenpersistenz.
*   **Intuitive Benutzeroberfläche:** Fokus auf Übersichtlichkeit und einfache Bedienung.
*   **Glasmorphismus Design:**  Moderner Look & Feel mit Transparenz, Schatten und Frost-Glas-Effekten.

**I. Farbpalette & CSS Variablen (:root)**

Wir vermeiden die üblichen AI-Farbverläufe und setzen auf eine gedämpfte, aber dennoch moderne Palette.

{"code": "### FILENAME: app.py ```python from flask import Flask, render_template, request, redirect, url_for from flask_sqlalchemy import SQLAlchemy from flask_wtf import FlaskForm from wtforms import StringField, TextAreaField, SelectField, SubmitField from wtforms.validators import DataRequired app = Flask(__name__) app.config['SECRET_KEY'] = 'secret_key' app.config['SQLALCHEMY_DATABASE_URI'] = 'sqlite:///todo.db' db = SQLAlchemy(app) class Task(db.Model): id = db.Column(db.Integer, primary_key=True) name = db.Column(db.String(100), nullable=False) description = db.Column(db.Text, nullable=False) status = db.Column(db.String(50), nullable=False, default='Open') def __repr__(self): return f'Task({self.name}, {self.status})' class BugReport(db.Model): id = db.Column(db.Integer, primary_key=True) task_id = db.Column(db.Integer, db.ForeignKey('task.id'), nullable=False) task = db.relationship('Task', backref=db.backref('bug_reports', lazy=True)) report_date = db.Column(db.DateTime, nullable=False, default=db.func.current_timestamp()) description = db.Column(db.Text, nullable=False) steps_to_reproduce = db.Column(db.Text, nullable=False) severity = db.Column(db.String(50), nullable=False) status = db.Column(db.String(50), nullable=False, default='Open') def __repr__(self): return f'BugReport({self.task.name}, {self.status})' class IdeaSubmission(db.Model): id = db.Column(db.Integer, primary_key=True) task_id = db.Column(db.Integer, db.ForeignKey('task.id'), nullable=False) task = db.relationship('Task', backref=db.backref('idea_submissions', lazy=True)) submission_date = db.Column(db.DateTime, nullable=False, default=db.func.current_timestamp()) description = db.Column(db.Text, nullable=False) priority = db.Column(db.Integer, nullable=False) status = db.Column(db.String(50), nullable=False, default='Open') def __repr__(self): return f'IdeaSubmission({self.task.name}, {self.status})' class TaskForm(FlaskForm): name = StringField('Name', validators=[DataRequired()]) description = TextAreaField('Description', validators=[DataRequired()]) status = SelectField('Status', choices=['Open', 'In Progress', 'Resolved', 'Closed']) submit = SubmitField('Submit') class BugReportForm(FlaskForm): task_id = SelectField('Task', coerce=int) description = TextAreaField('Description', validators=[DataRequired()]) steps_to_reproduce = TextAreaField('Steps to Reproduce', validators=[DataRequired()]) severity = SelectField('Severity', choices=['Critical', 'Major', 'Minor', 'Trivial']) status = SelectField('Status', choices=['Open', 'In Progress', 'Resolved', 'Closed']) submit = SubmitField('Submit') class IdeaSubmissionForm(FlaskForm): task_id = SelectField('Task', coerce=int) description = TextAreaField('Description', validators=[DataRequired()]) priority = SelectField('Priority', choices=[1, 2, 3, 4, 5]) status = SelectField('Status', choices=['Open', 'Under Review', 'Planned', 'Implemented', 'Rejected']) submit = SubmitField('Submit') @app.route('/') def index(): tasks = Task.query.all() return render_template('index.html', tasks=tasks) @app.route('/task/new', methods=['GET', 'POST']) def new_task(): form = TaskForm() if form.validate_on_submit(): task = Task(name=form.name.data, description=form.description.data, status=form.status.data) db.session.add(task) db.session.commit() return redirect(url_for('index')) return render_template('new_task.html', form=form) @app.route('/bug_report/new', methods=['GET', 'POST']) def new_bug_report(): form = BugReportForm() form.task_id.choices = [(task.id, task.name) for task in Task.query.all()] if form.validate_on_submit(): bug_report = BugReport(task_id=form.task_id.data, description=form.description.data, steps_to_reproduce=form.steps_to_reproduce.data, severity=form.severity.data, status=form.status.data) db.session.add(bug_report) db.session.commit() return redirect(url_for('index')) return render_template('new_bug_report.html', form=form) @app.route('/idea_submission/new', methods=['GET', 'POST']) def new_idea_submission(): form = IdeaSubmissionForm() form.task_id.choices = [(task.id, task.name) for task in Task.query.all()] if form.validate_on_submit(): idea_submission = IdeaSubmission(task_id=form.task_id.data, description=form.description.data, priority=form.priority.data, status=form.status.data) db.session.add(idea_submission) db.session.commit() return redirect(url_for('index')) return render_template('new_idea_submission.html', form=form) if __name__ == '__main__': app.run(debug=True) ``` ### FILENAME: templates/index.html ```html ToDo Liste
